We had an amazing experience! We opted for the outdoor seating, which was lovely‚Äîcomplete with a swing and a beautiful view, complemented by a pleasant climate. The food was outstanding, with each dish we tried being of the highest quality and bursting with flavor.

The five spiced vegetables dish was perfectly cooked and full of flavor, The pulled chicken korean bao is a must-try and was fabulous! For dessert, the brownie and ice cream were fantastic‚Äîespecially with the generous portion of ice cream.

I highly recommend this place and will definitely be back soon to out more dishes. The staff were fantastic, providing helpful recommendations throughout.

N last but not d least the food hd great taste n the plating was excellent n service is quicküòç overall the place is üòé awesome. Hope to visit again soon.

We came with my MIL who was visiting us for lunch. The food we had was very tasty.

It included:
- veg spring rolls
- tandoori momos
- green Thai curry
- tandoori dal fry
- paneer makani
- paneer tacos
- cheesecake ice cream

The service was overall quite good. The momos were super spicy for my husband and MIL so they were kind enough to take the remaining back and adjust the sauce.

Only it took a really long time for them to send out my husband‚Äôs drink which was basically a thumbs up float with vanilla ice cream and we had to remind them at least 3 times. My MIL and I had mocktails that were more complicated to make and they came out right away.

They played good music, mostly covers of popular songs. We had a good laugh hearing Linkin Park‚Äôs ‚ÄúNumb‚Äù being played to a dance beat.

The seating is fun and creative, with an outdoor section with a swing bench.
